0: The bathroom has a tub shower and is spacious which was very nice after staying in Paris where the hotel rooms are very small
The room was quite spacious and seemed very sound proof
Many of the bedrooms have a window onto this courtyard and these bedrooms are very quiet
Breakfast just incredible confortable junior suites for 2 adults and 2 kids
The rooms are modern and always very clean and tidy
The room eas great great bed
Also 3 lifts and a very full hotel a conference was taking place and only 2 lifts workingThe rooms are adequate the beds are comfortable
Got room upgraded once only because I asked and were reluctantly given
The Royal Viking Hotel is very central when leaving the doors of the central station the entrance to the hotel is within view
Family room was spacious and comfortable but bathroom was bit dated
1: You have been given a Superior Room which is one of our better room types
I took this as they acknowledged a family room booking but may put us in another family room
The room and bathroom were an average size and nicely decorated
Room i had one of the as yet un renovated rooms as the front desk knew i wanted a quiet room
I travelled alone and my suitcase just fitted in the room
And we were asked about our names and room numbers without any explanation
Hotel changed the room but no apology or help
TV had BC and CN International
but there are better locations to stay Quality Price unbelievable Room and we did not get the cheapest one
2: The room was not that cozy and it was not possible to fully close the window
Our rooms were not super clean when we arrived
Spa and room shower could have been better
We had to stand in a queue three times and when we finally got into the room it was like a family room with 2 adjacent rooms and 2 separate beds with a tiny shower room with no towels
They told us that they did not have standard rooms with king size beds only queen sized beds and hotelscom probably did not have an option are you kidding me
The bathroom was not small and had enough space to store your stuff
Bottled water were never replaced even though I stayed there 3 nights
Sewage smell was unbearable in the room if you are dreaming of having a peaceful time at the spa
My bathroom mirror in my room made a very high pitch noise whenever left on for more than 2 minutes
